title: The Strange Fate of Capricious Jones
description: The Triple Alliance, led by Kaiser Otto II, struck without warning. The combination of Prussian military might, Austrian clockwork, and Ottoman funding cut through the unprepared Entente powers like a chainsaw through Brie; hamstringing Britain, pinning Russia, and very nearly destroying France. The year is 1908, and the Entente is almost defunct. One base in southern France is all that remains.I'll be posting the entire Iron Angel series over on RoyalRoad!
author: Robert Roman
